A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is worse than bad.  This isn't just a bad Star Wars movie that destroys the legacy of some of the most beloved Star Wars characters like Luke and General Ackbar - it has bad writing\, glaring plot holes and it treats the audience like idiots (like when Princess Leia floats like Marry Poppins through space with no force training through a door seemingly unaffected by the vacuum of space).\n\nI could go on and on for an hour about how terrible this movie was.  It will be a dated movie that people will not relate to in 10 years time unlike the heroic struggle that was the original three movies.
